query: How do I reset my password?

documents.text: To reset your password, go to Settings > Account > Reset Password. Enter your email and click the reset link sent to you.
Python password hashing tutorial: Use bcrypt library to securely hash passwords in your application.
Customer support is available Monday-Friday 9am-5pm EST. Contact us at support@example.com.
Password requirements: minimum 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
Forgot your username? Visit the login page and click 'Forgot username' to recover it via email.
If your payment fails, check that your credit card hasn't expired and has sufficient funds. Contact your bank if the issue persists.
We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and PayPal. All transactions are encrypted and secure.
Monthly subscription costs $9.99. Annual subscription is $99 (save 17%). Enterprise plans start at $299/month.
Credit card declined error: This happens when your card issuer rejects the transaction. Common reasons include insufficient funds, expired card, or fraud protection.
Refund policy: Request a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.
If the application is loading slowly, try clearing your browser cache and cookies. This often resolves performance issues.
System requirements: Minimum 4GB RAM, modern browser (Chrome 90+, Firefox 88+, Safari 14+), stable internet connection.
Performance optimization tips: Disable browser extensions, close unused tabs, check your internet speed at speedtest.net.
Our API returns JSON responses with average latency under 200ms. Rate limit is 1000 requests per hour.
Scheduled maintenance: We perform system updates every Sunday 2am-4am EST. Expect brief downtime during this window.

query: how to export data to CSV file

documents.text: To export your data, go to Reports > Export > Select CSV format. Choose date range and columns, then click Download.
Data retention policy: We store your data for 90 days. Download exports before the retention period expires.
CSV file format: Comma-separated values with header row. Open in Excel, Google Sheets, or any spreadsheet application.
Bulk import data from CSV: Go to Settings > Import and upload your file. Map columns to database fields.
API endpoint for data export: GET /api/export?format=csv&start_date=YYYY-MM-DD&end_date=YYYY-MM-DD

query: mobile app not syncing with cloud

documents.text: If your mobile app isn't syncing, check your internet connection and ensure you're logged into the same account on all devices.
Cloud storage limits: Free tier includes 5GB. Upgrade to Premium for 100GB or Enterprise for unlimited storage.
Sync troubleshooting: Force quit the app, restart your phone, and log back in. If issues persist, reinstall the app.
Mobile app features: Available on iOS 14+ and Android 9+. Offline mode, push notifications, biometric login.
Desktop app sync: Install the desktop client from our downloads page. Syncs automatically every 5 minutes.
